tournament.name: Red Bull Untapped Online Qualifier UK

decks.notes: The deck focuses on utilizing powerful early game creatures like Pelt Collector and Barkhide Troll to quickly establish board control and pressure the opponent. With cards like Questing Beast and Stonecoil Serpent providing additional damage and evasion, the goal is to overwhelm the opponent before they can stabilize. Cards like Primal Might and Vivien, Arkbow Ranger provide removal and additional reach, while Nissa, Who Shakes the World can provide a massive boost in mana and power. The deck's aggressive strategy is supported by the efficient mana base of Forests and Castle Garenbrig.

This deck focuses on controlling the game through sacrificing creatures and generating value. By using cards like Priest of Forgotten Gods and Witch's Oven to sacrifice creatures, the deck can trigger effects such as drawing cards, dealing damage, and gaining mana. With cards like Mayhem Devil and Korvold, Fae-Cursed King, the deck can turn these sacrifices into additional advantages and threats for the opponent to deal with. The goal is to outvalue the opponent and maintain control of the game until victory.

This deck focuses on controlling the opponent's board and hand through a combination of removal spells, counterspells, and discard effects. By utilizing powerful planeswalkers like Teferi, Nicol Bolas, and Narset, along with cards like Elspeth Conquers Death and Atris, the deck aims to maintain card advantage and disrupt the opponent's strategy. The mana base is designed to support a variety of color requirements, allowing the deck to consistently cast its spells and control the game until it can deploy its win conditions.

The deck focuses on flooding the battlefield with low-cost, efficient creatures to overwhelm the opponent quickly. Utilizing cards like Glorious Anthem and Venerated Loxodon to boost the power of the weenie creatures, while also including protection in the form of Selfless Savior and Giant Killer. The deck aims to maintain constant pressure on the opponent through aggressive attacks and strategic use of cards like Unbreakable Formation and Basri's Solidarity to buff the creatures further. Castle Ardenvale provides additional creature tokens for added board presence.

The deck focuses on controlling the game through a combination of powerful planeswalkers like Teferi and Nissa, board wipes like Shatter the Sky, and card draw with cards like Growth Spiral. Hydroid Krasis provides a win condition and additional card draw, while Uro serves as a resilient threat. The deck aims to stabilize the board, generate card advantage, and eventually overwhelm the opponent with powerful spells and threats. The mana base is designed to support the multiple color requirements of the deck's spells, with efficient lands like Fabled Passage and Ketria Triome.

The main concept of this Golgari Aggro deck is to quickly establish a strong board presence and apply pressure on the opponent with a combination of efficient creatures like Questing Beast, Lovestruck Beast, and Murderous Rider, supported by removal spells like Eliminate and Agonizing Remorse. The deck also includes card advantage engines like Edgewall Innkeeper and The Great Henge to maintain tempo and outvalue the opponent. The inclusion of Vivien, Arkbow Ranger and Jolrael, Mwonvuli Recluse provide additional utility and flexibility to adapt to different board states. Castle Locthwain and Fabled Passage offer some card filtering and fixing for the mana base.

The deck focuses on controlling the game by using counterspells, removal, and card advantage to disrupt the opponent's plays. It utilizes cards like Teferi, Time Raveler and Wilderness Reclamation to generate value and tempo. The win condition comes from casting big spells like Expansion / Explosion and Shark Typhoon, while also gaining card advantage with Uro, Titan of Nature's Wrath. The mana base supports the deck's three-color identity, and includes lands that can provide extra utility. Overall, the deck aims to outvalue and outlast the opponent by controlling the flow of the game.

The primary strategy of this deck is to control the board through countering spells, drawing cards, and generating mana with Wilderness Reclamation. Key cards like Teferi, Time Raveler and Shark Typhoon help maintain board presence and disrupt the opponent's game plan. Expansion / Explosion serves as a versatile finisher or card advantage engine. Uro, Titan of Nature's Wrath provides card draw and a resilient threat, while Brazen Borrower offers tempo plays. Kenrith, the Returned King and Bonecrusher Giant give additional utility and flexibility in different situations. The deck aims to outvalue and outlast opponents through efficient control and resource management.

The main focus of this Bant Control deck is to establish board control and out-value the opponent with powerful creatures and planeswalkers. By utilizing cards like Uro, Titan of Nature's Wrath and Hydroid Krasis to gain card advantage and tempo, along with removal spells like Shatter the Sky and Aether Gust to control the board, the deck aims to dominate the game through card advantage and efficient resource management. Additionally, the deck includes powerful planeswalkers like Teferi, Time Raveler and Nissa, Who Shakes the World to further control the game and generate additional value.

The deck focuses on overwhelming the opponent with a fast and aggressive strategy using powerful green creatures. It includes cards like Barkhide Troll, Lovestruck Beast, and Questing Beast to quickly build a strong board presence. Cards like The Great Henge and Vivien, Arkbow Ranger provide additional support and card advantage. With a mix of creature pumps like Primal Might and efficient removal with cards like Ram Through, the deck aims to apply consistent pressure and quickly close out games. Land cards like Mobilized District and Castle Garenbrig help ramp up for bigger threats.

The main focus of this deck is to quickly overwhelm your opponent with a fast and aggressive mono green aggro strategy. By playing efficient and powerful creatures like Yorvo, Lord of Garenbrig and Questing Beast, along with support cards like The Great Henge and Vivien, Arkbow Ranger, you can quickly build a threatening board presence. The high creature count and mana ramping from cards like Castle Garenbrig allow you to apply pressure early and maintain a strong board state throughout the game.

The main focus of this deck is to quickly overwhelm the opponent with powerful, aggressive creatures. By utilizing creatures with high power and abilities such as trample and hexproof, the deck aims to deal damage quickly and efficiently. The inclusion of cards like Primal Might allows for removal of opposing threats, while cards like Scavenging Ooze provide both offensive and defensive capabilities. The deck also includes some utility lands to ensure consistent mana production and the ability to activate Mobilized District for additional threats.

The deck focuses on quickly overwhelming opponents with fast, aggressive creatures and burn spells. It utilizes a low mana curve with a high number of one and two drops to apply early pressure. Key cards like Torbran, Fervent Champion, and Anax, Hardened in the Forge help increase damage output and make it difficult for opponents to stabilize. The deck aims to end the game quickly before opponents have a chance to set up their defenses or gain control of the board.

The main focus of this deck is to control the game through counter spells and removal while ramping up mana with cards like Growth Spiral and Wilderness Reclamation. The goal is to generate a large amount of mana to cast powerful spells like Shark Typhoon and Expansion/Explosion. The inclusion of cards like Aether Gust and Mystical Dispute helps protect your board state and disrupt your opponent's game plan. The deck also includes threats like Uro, Titan of Nature's Wrath and Brazen Borrower to provide a win condition.

The deck focuses on flooding the board with cheap, low-cost creatures to overwhelm the opponent quickly. By utilizing cards like Selfless Savior and Garrison Cat for early defense, followed by powerful creatures like Venerated Loxodon and Seasoned Hallowblade, the deck aims to maintain constant pressure on the opponent. Unbreakable Formation and Glorious Anthem provide strong buffing effects to further bolster the army of creatures. The inclusion of Tithe Taker and Giant Killer adds disruption and removal options, while Castle Ardenvale offers additional creature generation. Overall, the strategy revolves around aggressive creature play and maintaining a strong board presence.

This deck focuses on utilizing the Aggro strategy to overwhelm opponents with a steady stream of creatures and aggressive plays, culminating in the powerful Winota, Joiner of Forces. By quickly building a wide board presence and utilizing Winota's ability to cheat out powerful creatures, the deck aims to close out games swiftly before the opponent has a chance to stabilize. With cards like Judith, the Scourge Diva and Basri's Lieutenant providing additional support and synergy, this deck aims to be fast and aggressive, putting pressure on opponents from the very beginning.
